bind to such that each IP only has a single request coming from it at
any given time.  Two questions:

1.  Any suggestions for the best way to do this?

2.  If my basic way of making a commons ObjectPool of HttpClient
objects inside FetchHTTP sounds like a good idea, should I make it an
option within FetchHTTP itself or should I subclass it?
